plurals.name: show_dev_countdown_awaken
plurals.item: 剩下 %1$d 個步驟即可啟用開發人員選項。

resources.string: 您已經啟用開發人員選項！
不需要了，您已經啟用開發人員選項。
用三根手指向下滑動即可擷取螢幕畫面
同步鈴聲 & 與通知音量
啟動進階重新啟動選單
在電源選單中顯示 Recovery 和 Bootloader 選項
調整狀態列與快速設定
輕觸兩下鎖定畫面上的任意位置以鎖定
輕觸兩下狀態列的任何位置以鎖定
開啟（在響鈴模式之間切換）
螢幕關閉時，長按音量鍵即可切換曲目
按下音量鍵即可喚醒裝置
自訂您的狀態列時鐘與日期
在時鐘前面顯示自定義日期
必須符合 DateFormat 格式 例如：MM/dd/yy
Hide and show clock at regular intervals of time
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
電池的歷史統計資料將被清除
Double tap power button (slower single tap response), Disables double power tap for camera.
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Control vibration intensity for different streams
螢幕開啟時，通知將會連同音效與震動一併顯示
僅顯示來自電話、簡訊的浮動通知
Enable combined signal icons in status bar.\nRequires a SystemUI restart
Hide navbar pill and keyboard space
Pulse notifications by a double tap
Show the brightness slider on the bottom of QS
Show an auto brightness toggle near the brightness slider
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Enable haptic tick effect on back gesture
Display the exclamation sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Show doze screen all the time when charging
Light ambient edges for pulsing notifications
Keep showing edge lightning on AOD
Hide AOD content when edges are lighted
Time it takes for each animation to complete
Amount of times the animation should show\n0 for infinite
Display media art as lockscreen background
在這些應用中禁用浮動通知
禁用來自這些應用的浮動通知
浮動通知將顯示 %d 秒
向上滑動浮動通知將暫停來自該應用的通知 1 分鐘
向上滑動浮動通知將暫停來自該應用的通知 %d 分鐘
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Automatically turn off Wi-Fi after a set amount of time.
Wi-Fi will turn off after %1$s if no network connected
Bluetooth will turn off after %1$s if no devices connected
Show network speed in the status bar

The following QS tiles require unlocking before you can acccess them from lock screen:\nAirplane, Cellular, Bluetooth, Data saver, Battery saver, Work mode, Rotation, NFC, Hotspot, USB tethering and Location
Hides QS if device is locked. Does not disable notification shade
在鎖定螢幕中停用電源選單
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Show Ambient Display when a new music track is played
解鎖裝置時使用亂序 PIN 布局
當正確輸入 PIN 碼/密碼時自動解鎖
靜音後，自適應播放會自動暫停媒體，當音量在設定時間內恢復時會自動恢復播放。
Swipe positions between back and recents
Show separate indicator when an any app uses mic or camera
Show location in the privacy chip
Show location in status bar icons
Permit hotspot clients to use this device\u2019s VPN connections for upstream connectivity
Your mobile hotspot\'s name won\'t appear in the list of available WLAN networks.
List and manage devices connected to the hotspot
List devices connected to the hotspot
This action will disconnect \"%1$s\" from this device and add it to blocklist
The device \"%1$s\" will be able to connect to this hotspot
No clients are currently available. Connected and blocked devices will be listed here when available.
Brightness adjustment will only occur at the moment the screen is turned on
color, color balance, color correction, red, green, blue, LiveDisplay
Battery light behaviour while on DND, low battery
充電完成時顯示充電指示燈
零打擾模式下顯示電量指示燈
Remove existing face scan and create a new scan
Do you want to remove the existing face scan and create a new one?
允許在鎖定畫面使用臉部辨識解鎖
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Show ripple effect on unlock with fingerprint
允許針對個別應用程式設定音量
Force apps to ignore notch space
耳機（如果正在播放媒體）
Select the apps to protect with biometrics or device credentials
Duration of time after which an unlocked app in background should be locked
Notification content will be hidden and collapsed for selected apps when they are locked. Heads up notifications will be automatically disabled.
Bubbles will be automatically dismissed after timeout
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn

Use the first and second seekbar to configure back swipe sensitivity, the last seekbar to set a dead area on top of the screen where the swipe cannot be triggered, to avoid conflicts with in-app gestures.
在省電模式開啟時使用 60 Hz 螢幕更新率以減少電量消耗
Adjust accent color, colorfulness and brightness
Choose a custom accent color to override the colors chosen by monet engine
Pull down statusbar from right side to expand quick settings
Applications that should be hidden from launcher. Requires a launcher restart for changes to take effect
Please select an action to perform
Select what happens when you use Quick Tap. You can change this later in settings.
Let’s try that once more. Quickly tap the back of your phone twice.
You’re ready to start using Quick Tap
Quickly tap the back of your phone twice.
To change the tap strength needed to use Quick Tap, go to Settings.
You‘ve just tapped twice on the back of your device, which allows you to use your Assistant on the go. You can customize this gesture in settings.
Take a screenshot, show notifications, or start another action in two taps.
Please select an app to open
Select the app you’d like to open when you use Quick Tap.
Tap back of phone twice to
Select an app to open when you tap the back of your phone twice. If you uninstall the app, Quick Tap turns off until you select a different app.
Select what happens when you open this app using Quick Tap.
Show media player in QS\nRequires a SystemUI restart
Show media player as a notification\nRequires a SystemUI restart
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock phone
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock tablet
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock device
To wake up your screen and unlock, long press your under-display fingerprint sensor.
